name: The Spellbent Keep
description:
The Spellbent Keep

A First Person, Dungeon-Crawling, Turn-Based, Role-Playing Game.


Powerful Dark-Magic is being unleashed upon Raylyn Keep and only a Battlemage such as yourself is capable of deterring it.


Use the experience you gain to wield mighty weapons and cast powerful spells to battle your foes! Buy and sell equipment and items! Discover hidden loot, a treasure trove of enemies, and the pathway to the source of all this Dark-Magic!

Enjoy The Launch Sale at 50% OFF!


@BillySlang
